title: Shattered Fate
description: Lyn has lived a tragic life. Reeling from the loss of her parents, and then her adoptive parents, Lyn has risen above all of her adversity to create the life she had hoped for. Despite her struggles, Lyn has become a gifted physician and the founder of a charitable think-tank, providing care to the less-fortunate and seeking to better her world. Lyn is right where she wants to be, doing just what she always hoped to do- but fate has other plans for her. Surviving a brutal crash on a dark forest road, she is rushed to the hospital in an attempt to save her life. Even with the best medical care, her relentless tragedy looms over the sterile room. Lyn has been infected by an unknown pathogen which threatens to take the life she has so meticulously created. Lyn finds hope through her strong, lifelong friendships, and the unbreakable connection she shares with her faithful dog Luna. She seeks the will to fight her unrelenting thirst and to protect the humanity she has worked so hard to save.Shattered Fate is an intriguing debut novel by Leri Lake that keeps you cheering for Lyn's success and wondering how she will overcome her latest tragedy in this new Bloody and Twisted life.
author: Leri Lake
